summary: "Amélie" is a 2001 French romantic comedy directed by Jean-Pierre Jeunet. It tells the story of Amélie Poulain, a shy waitress played by Audrey Tautou, who tries to improve the lives of those around her in Montmartre, Paris. The film was a big hit, earning praise for its charming story, beautiful visuals, and Tautou's performance. It won many awards and made a lot of money worldwide, making it one of France's most successful films internationally.
title: Amélie
